Texts.Eng: As promised, here is the schematic for that Bone Crossbow. Fight well, Captain.

I see you carry a bone bow, Captain. Far too few people in this refuge use traditional weapons nowadays... I have a ^orange;Bone Crossbow schematic ^white;you can have, if you prove yourself a capable hunter. ^green;Return to me with a ^orange;Great Monster Bone^green;, and the schematic is yours.
